Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Having an AI made me feel more comfortable to learn compared to the teachers where I can make less unwanted human interactions to learn. Significantly increased the study time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teachers seem more interested in rating my work instead of giving feedback on what I can work on, where as GenAI is actively seeking for improvements and step by step guide on what I can do to improve my academic scores and knowledge.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers are sometimes biased depending on their beliefs, especially on sensitive topics. However, AI only looks at the idea and how it is presented.
